verbs.description: [V: slain] [ARG1: hartford teacher] talked about getting restraining order hours before her death hours before hartford teacher danielle fasciocco was found slain in her middletown apartment sept 8 she told a coworker that she was thinking of getting a restraining order against an ex - boyfriend now charged with her killing court records released monday said superior court murder chief state medical examiner hartford public schools dana casser university of hartford hartford ms danielle fasciocco fasciocco courant ms danielle fasciocco hartford connecticut westlake drive cornel myers middletown betances stem magnet school middletown superior court myers hartford school
